channel.title: SMF 77 Subtype 1 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 77 Subtype 1 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - abd
item.description: ENQUEUE EVENT PROCESSING ABEND Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Description ENQUEUE EVENT PROCESSING ABEND Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - altvm
item.description: Running under an alternate virtual machine environment Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Description Running under an alternate virtual machine environment Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field fla.

item.title: Field - aql
item.description: Accumulated Q length, same as SMF77QLT Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77AQL Description Accumulated Q length, same as SMF77QLT

item.title: Field - arch_mode
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Description System in z/ARCH mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF77S1 Based on: flg Description SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Description Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - btm
item.description: ENQUEUE HAD BAD CPU CLOCK Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Description ENQUEUE HAD BAD CPU CLOCK Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - cne
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Description Equipped with ESCON channel Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Description Data converted from version 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - csc
item.description: Total number of contention status change events that occurred during the measurement interval. Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77CSC Description Total number of contention status change events that occurred during the measurement interval.

item.title: Field - current_owner_number
item.description: NUMBER OF CURRENT OWNER Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77DOW Description NUMBER OF CURRENT OWNER

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77CYC Description Sampling cycle length

item.title: Field - d1e
item.description: ON = WAITING JOB 1 FOR EXCLUSIVE USAGE, OFF = WAITING JOB 1 FOR SHARED USE Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: dfg Description ON = WAITING JOB 1 FOR EXCLUSIVE USAGE, OFF = WAITING JOB 1 FOR SHARED USE Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field dfg.

item.title: Field - d2e
item.description: ON = WAITING JOB 2 FOR EXCLUSIVE USAGE, OFF = WAITING JOB 2 FOR SHARED USE Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: dfg Description ON = WAITING JOB 2 FOR EXCLUSIVE USAGE, OFF = WAITING JOB 2 FOR SHARED USE Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field dfg.

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77DAT Description Date monitor interval start

item.title: Field - dat_facility1
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dat_facility2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77DTE

item.title: Field - det
item.description: DETAIL DATA REQUESTED Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Description DETAIL DATA REQUESTED Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - detail_data_req
item.description: DETAIL DATA REQUESTED Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Description DETAIL DATA REQUESTED Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - dfg
item.description: ENQ DETAIL DATA STATUS Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77DFG Description ENQ DETAIL DATA STATUS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description resource_contention 0 RESOURCE IN CONTENTION system_scope 1 ON = SCOPE OF SYSTEMS OFF = SCOPE OF SYSTEM exclusive_owner 2 ON = EXCLUSIVE OWNER, OFF = OWNER SHARES RESOURCE job_wait_for_exc_usage 3 ON = WAITING JOB 1 FOR EXCLUSIVE USAGE, OFF = WAITING JOB 1 FOR SHARED USE job_wait_for_2exc_usage 4 ON = WAITING JOB 2 FOR EXCLUSIVE USAGE, OFF = WAITING JOB 2 FOR SHARED USE global_resource 5 ON = GLOBAL RESOURCE, OFF = LOCAL RESOURCE

item.title: Field - dou
item.description: ON = EXCLUSIVE OWNER, OFF = OWNER SHARES RESOURCE Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: dfg Description ON = EXCLUSIVE OWNER, OFF = OWNER SHARES RESOURCE Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field dfg.

item.title: Field - drc
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Description ESCON Director in configuration Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77DTE Description DATE RECORD WRITTEN

item.title: Field - edl
item.description: LENGTH OF ENQUEUE DATA SECTION Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77EDL Description LENGTH OF ENQUEUE DATA SECTION

item.title: Field - edn
item.description: NUMBER OF ENQUEUE DATA SECTIONS Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77EDN Description NUMBER OF ENQUEUE DATA SECTIONS

item.title: Field - eds
item.description: OFFSET TO ENQUEUE DATA SECTION Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77EDS Description OFFSET TO ENQUEUE DATA SECTION

item.title: Field - eed
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Description Speed boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - eme
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Description System in z/ARCH mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - enqueue_bad_cpu_clock
item.description: ENQUEUE HAD BAD CPU CLOCK Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Description ENQUEUE HAD BAD CPU CLOCK Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - enqueue_processing_abend
item.description: ENQUEUE EVENT PROCESSING ABEND Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Description ENQUEUE EVENT PROCESSING ABEND Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - eql
item.description: LENGTH OF ENQUEUE CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77EQL Description LENGTH OF ENQUEUE CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - eqn
item.description: NUMBER OF ENQUEUE CONTROL SECTIONS Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77EQN Description NUMBER OF ENQUEUE CONTROL SECTIONS

item.title: Field - eqs
item.description: OFFSET TO ENQUEUE CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77EQS Description OFFSET TO ENQUEUE CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF77S1 Based on: flg Description MVS/ESA IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - escon_ch
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Description Equipped with ESCON channel Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - escon_dir
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Description ESCON Director in configuration Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - evt
item.description: Total number of contention events that occurred during the measurement interval. A contention event is the period starting from the time when the resource has contention until the resource no longer has contention. Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77EVT Description Total number of contention events that occurred during the measurement interval. A contention event is the period starting from the time when the resource has contention until the resource no longer has contention.

item.title: Field - exclusive_owner
item.description: ON = EXCLUSIVE OWNER, OFF = OWNER SHARES RESOURCE Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: dfg Description ON = EXCLUSIVE OWNER, OFF = OWNER SHARES RESOURCE Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field dfg.

item.title: Field - exm
item.description: MINIMUM NUMBER OF EXCLUSIVE REQUESTS Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77EXM Description MINIMUM NUMBER OF EXCLUSIVE REQUESTS

item.title: Field - expanded_stor
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Description System has expanded storage Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - exx
item.description: MAXIMUM NUMBER OF EXCLUSIVE REQUESTS Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77EXX Description MAXIMUM NUMBER OF EXCLUSIVE REQUESTS

item.title: Field - fg1
item.description: ENQUEUE STATUS INDICATOR Map: SMF77CTL Based on: SMF77FG1 Description ENQUEUE STATUS INDICATOR Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description resource_no_contention 1 SPECIFIED RESOURCE HAD NO CONTENTION enqueue_bad_cpu_clock 2 ENQUEUE HAD BAD CPU CLOCK enqueue_processing_abend 3 ENQUEUE EVENT PROCESSING ABEND detail_data_req 4 DETAIL DATA REQUESTED grs_none 5 GRS=NONE mode or local SYSPLEX if set grs_ring 6 GRS=RING, if not set and SMF77NON off grs_mode 7 GRS mode flags SMF77NON and SMF77STR are valid, if set

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77FLA Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 invalid_samples 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III interval_smf_control 3 Interval was under SMF control lower_service_level 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77FLG Description SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77GIE Description Projected gathering interval end GMT time

item.title: Field - glb
item.description: ON = GLOBAL RESOURCE, OFF = LOCAL RESOURCE Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: dfg Description ON = GLOBAL RESOURCE, OFF = LOCAL RESOURCE Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field dfg.

item.title: Field - global_resource
item.description: ON = GLOBAL RESOURCE, OFF = LOCAL RESOURCE Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: dfg Description ON = GLOBAL RESOURCE, OFF = LOCAL RESOURCE Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field dfg.

item.title: Field - gmv
item.description: GRS mode flags SMF77NON and SMF77STR are valid, if set Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Description GRS mode flags SMF77NON and SMF77STR are valid, if set Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - grs_interface_problem
item.description: RMF/GRS interface problem Map: SMF77CTL Based on: rf2 Description RMF/GRS interface problem Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field rf2.

item.title: Field - grs_mode
item.description: GRS mode flags SMF77NON and SMF77STR are valid, if set Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Description GRS mode flags SMF77NON and SMF77STR are valid, if set Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - grs_none
item.description: GRS=NONE mode or local SYSPLEX if set Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Description GRS=NONE mode or local SYSPLEX if set Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - grs_ring
item.description: GRS=RING, if not set and SMF77NON off Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Description GRS=RING, if not set and SMF77NON off Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - grs_sys_problem
item.description: GRS system problems Map: SMF77CTL Based on: rf2 Description GRS system problems Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field rf2.

item.title: Field - gsp
item.description: GRS system problems Map: SMF77CTL Based on: rf2 Description GRS system problems Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field rf2.

item.title: Field - higher_service_level
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - hld
item.description: RESOURCE IN CONTENTION Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: dfg Description RESOURCE IN CONTENTION Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field dfg.

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77IET Description Interval expiration time token

item.title: Field - iip
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Description zIIP boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. X'03’ = 9672, zSeries Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77IML Description Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77INT Description Duration of monitor interval

item.title: Field - interval_smf_control
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Description Interval was under SMF control Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - invalid_samples
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Description Invalid samples to be skipped Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ism
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Description Interval was under SMF control Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iss
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Description Invalid samples to be skipped Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: Time monitor interval start Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77IST Description Time monitor interval start

item.title: Field - job_wait_for_2exc_usage
item.description: ON = WAITING JOB 2 FOR EXCLUSIVE USAGE, OFF = WAITING JOB 2 FOR SHARED USE Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: dfg Description ON = WAITING JOB 2 FOR EXCLUSIVE USAGE, OFF = WAITING JOB 2 FOR SHARED USE Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field dfg.

item.title: Field - job_wait_for_exc_usage
item.description: ON = WAITING JOB 1 FOR EXCLUSIVE USAGE, OFF = WAITING JOB 1 FOR SHARED USE Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: dfg Description ON = WAITING JOB 1 FOR EXCLUSIVE USAGE, OFF = WAITING JOB 1 FOR SHARED USE Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field dfg.

item.title: Field - jobs_waiting
item.description: NUMBER OF WAITING JOBS Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77DWR Description NUMBER OF WAITING JOBS

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77LEN Description SMF RECORD LENGTH. ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77LGO Description Offset GMT to local time

item.title: Field - lower_service_level
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Description Record was written by RMF Monitor III Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77MFV Description RMF version number

item.title: Field - mis
item.description: SPECIFIED RESOURCE HAD NO CONTENTION Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Description SPECIFIED RESOURCE HAD NO CONTENTION Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77MVS Description MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm)

item.title: Field - nod
item.description: Total number of contention status change events, accumulated during the measurement interval which did not provide specific contention detail data. Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77NOD Description Total number of contention status change events, accumulated during the measurement interval which did not provide specific contention detail data.

item.title: Field - non
item.description: GRS=NONE mode or local SYSPLEX if set Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Description GRS=NONE mode or local SYSPLEX if set Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77OIL Description Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds)

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF77S1 Based on: flg Description OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - pe2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ped
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77PRD Description Product name

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77PRF Description Processor flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description expanded_stor 0 System has expanded storage escon_ch 1 Equipped with ESCON channel escon_dir 2 ESCON Director in configuration arch_mode 3 System in z/ARCH mode zaap_inst 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed ziip_inst 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed dat_facility1 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 dat_facility2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - pri
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zAAP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77PRL Description LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77PRN Description NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS

item.title: Field - prp
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zIIP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77PRS Description OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77PTN Description PR/SM partition number

item.title: Field - qes
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Description System has expanded storage Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ql1
item.description: COUNTER FOR QUEUE LENGTH OF 1 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77QL1 Description COUNTER FOR QUEUE LENGTH OF 1

item.title: Field - ql2
item.description: COUNTER FOR QUEUE LENGTH OF 2 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77QL2 Description COUNTER FOR QUEUE LENGTH OF 2

item.title: Field - ql3
item.description: COUNTER FOR QUEUE LENGTH OF 3 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77QL3 Description COUNTER FOR QUEUE LENGTH OF 3

item.title: Field - ql4
item.description: COUNTER FOR QUEUE LENGTH OF 4 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77QL4 Description COUNTER FOR QUEUE LENGTH OF 4

item.title: Field - qnm
item.description: RESOURCE MAJOR NAME Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77QNM Description RESOURCE MAJOR NAME

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77RAL Description Length of reassembly area. Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - ran
item.description: Number of reassembly area. This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records. Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77RAN Description Number of reassembly area. This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken.

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77RAO Description Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section

item.title: Field - rch
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rcl
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - resource_contention
item.description: RESOURCE IN CONTENTION Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: dfg Description RESOURCE IN CONTENTION Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field dfg.

item.title: Field - resource_no_contention
item.description: SPECIFIED RESOURCE HAD NO CONTENTION Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Description SPECIFIED RESOURCE HAD NO CONTENTION Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - resource_owner1
item.description: CURRENT RESOURCE OWNER 1 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77DO1 Description CURRENT RESOURCE OWNER 1

item.title: Field - resource_owner2
item.description: CURRENT RESOURCE OWNER 2 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77DO2 Description CURRENT RESOURCE OWNER 2

item.title: Field - resource_waiter1
item.description: CURRENT RESOURCE WAITER 1 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77DW1 Description CURRENT RESOURCE WAITER 1

item.title: Field - resource_waiter2
item.description: CURRENT RESOURCE WAITER 2 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77DW2 Description CURRENT RESOURCE WAITER 2

item.title: Field - rf2
item.description: Additional status flags Map: SMF77CTL Based on: SMF77RF2 Description Additional status flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description grs_sys_problem 0 GRS system problems grs_interface_problem 1 RMF/GRS interface problem

item.title: Field - rgi
item.description: RMF/GRS interface problem Map: SMF77CTL Based on: rf2 Description RMF/GRS interface problem Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field rf2.

item.title: Field - rln
item.description: MINOR NAME LENGTH Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77RLN Description MINOR NAME LENGTH

item.title: Field - rnm
item.description: RESOURCE MINOR NAME Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77RNM Description RESOURCE MINOR NAME

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF77S1 Based on: flg Description NEW RECORD FORMAT Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77RTY Description RECORD TYPE

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77SAM Description Number of samples

item.title: Field - scp
item.description: ON = SCOPE OF SYSTEMS OFF = SCOPE OF SYSTEM Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: dfg Description ON = SCOPE OF SYSTEMS OFF = SCOPE OF SYSTEM Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field dfg.

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77SEG Description SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR

item.title: Field - shm
item.description: MINIMUM NUMBER OF SHARE REQUESTS Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77SHM Description MINIMUM NUMBER OF SHARE REQUESTS

item.title: Field - shx
item.description: MAXIMUM NUMBER OF SHARE REQUESTS Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77SHX Description MAXIMUM NUMBER OF SHARE REQUESTS

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77SID Description SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77SNM Description System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME

item.title: Field - speed_boost
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Description Speed boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77SRL Description SMF record level

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77SSI Description SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF )

item.title: Field - str
item.description: GRS=RING, if not set and SMF77NON off Map: SMF77CTL Based on: fg1 Description GRS=RING, if not set and SMF77NON off Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field fg1.

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77STY Description SUBTYPE

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF77S1 Based on: flg Description SUBTYPES USED Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77SYN Description SYNC value in seconds

item.title: Field - sys_owner1
item.description: SYSTEM ID OF OWNER 1 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77SY1 Description SYSTEM ID OF OWNER 1

item.title: Field - sys_owner2
item.description: SYSTEM ID OF OWNER 2 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77SY2 Description SYSTEM ID OF OWNER 2

item.title: Field - sys_waiter1
item.description: SYSTEM ID OF WAITER 1 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77SY3 Description SYSTEM ID OF WAITER 1

item.title: Field - sys_waiter2
item.description: SYSTEM ID OF WAITER 2 Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77SY4 Description SYSTEM ID OF WAITER 2

item.title: Field - system_scope
item.description: ON = SCOPE OF SYSTEMS OFF = SCOPE OF SYSTEM Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: dfg Description ON = SCOPE OF SYSTEMS OFF = SCOPE OF SYSTEM Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field dfg.

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF77S1 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TIME RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77TME Description TIME RECORD WRITTEN

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF77S1 Based on: SMF77TRN Description NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF77S1 Based on: flg Description MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF77S1 Based on: flg Description MVS/XA IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - wtm
item.description: RESOURCE MINIMUM WAITING TIME IN 1024 MICROSECOND UNIT Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77WTM Description RESOURCE MINIMUM WAITING TIME IN 1024 MICROSECOND UNIT

item.title: Field - wtt
item.description: TOTAL WAITING TIME Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77WTT Description TOTAL WAITING TIME

item.title: Field - wtx
item.description: MAXIMUM WAITING TIME Map: SMF77ENQ Based on: SMF77WTX Description MAXIMUM WAITING TIME

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF77PRO Based on: SMF77XNM Description Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX

item.title: Field - zaap_inst
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zAAP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ziip_boost
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF77PRO Based on: fla Description zIIP boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ziip_inst
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF77PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zIIP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.
